description: Built hung Jackson Phillips seems pissed off as he opens the door to his auto garage in Scene Three. Miles needs an estimate to repair the damage to his car, so Phillips puts him in the office and returns to the garage to get to work - on Randy Mixer. Mixer's cock still glistens from Phillips spit as they get back down to business. Judging from the rough ass-pounding he gives Phillips, the thought of young Miles waiting in the next room turns them both on. Mixer shoots a huge load that joins the puddle of cum Phillips has already shot all over himself.
title: Rear-Ended, Scene #03
